name: Edimax EU-4306 Gigabit Ethernet USB Type-A Network Adapter
Features: [Supported OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8, Mac OS 10.6/10.7/10.8, Linux kernel 3.x/2.6.x, Compliant with USB 3.0, 2.0 & 1.1 specifications, Supports USB Super/High/Full Speed, Supports all USB 3.0 power saving models, Supports Wake-on-LAN function, Supports IEEE 802.3az (Energy Efficient Ethernet), Supports IEEE 802.1x flow control and 802.1Q VLAN, Supports jumbo frames up to 4000 bytes, Supports Window 2000/XP/Vista/7/8 and Mac OS X 10.x.]
